trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Santa Ana
There were no other sightings in Santa Ana on or around November 28th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw several glowing orbs that I thought might be flares or something but they were traveling against the wind flow toward the ocean, They were way to yellow and orange to be a plane. Although I did see a plane in same area moving the same direction towards LAX. One by one they started to disappear. Very strange.
Summary: glowing orbs over the 405 fwy last night
